option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="#000000" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<!-- Toolbar/Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="The Rap Genius Contributors" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:background="#000000"/>
<!-- GridView with 3 columns --> <GridView android:id="@+id/gridViewContributors" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:numColumns="3" android:horizontalSpacing="2dp" android:verticalSpacing="2dp" android:padding="8dp" android:stretchMode="columnWidth" android:background="#000000"/>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="#000000" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<!-- Toolbar/Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="The Rap Genius Contributors" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:background="#000000"/>
<!-- GridView with 3 columns --> <GridView android:id="@+id/gridViewContributors" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:numColumns="3" android:horizontalSpacing="2dp" android:verticalSpacing="2dp" android:padding="8dp" android:stretchMode="columnWidth" android:background="#000000"/>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <style name="CardStyle"> <item name="android:background">@color/background_white</item> <item name="android:elevation">@dimen/elevation_low</item> <item name="android:padding">@dimen/padding_medium</item> </style>
<style name="TitleTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_title</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary_blue</item> <item name="android:gravity">center</item> </style>
<style name="SubtitleTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_subtitle</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary_teal</item> <item name="android:gravity">center</item> </style>
<style name="NormalTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> </style>
<style name="SecondaryTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_secondary</item> </style>
<style name="InputStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:textColorHint">@color/text_hint</item> <item name="android:padding">@dimen/padding_medium</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <style name="CardStyle"> <item name="android:background">@color/background_white</item> <item name="android:elevation">@dimen/elevation_low</item> <item name="android:padding">@dimen/padding_medium</item> </style>
<style name="TitleTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_title</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary_blue</item> <item name="android:gravity">center</item> </style>
<style name="SubtitleTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_subtitle</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/primary_teal</item> <item name="android:gravity">center</item> </style>
<style name="NormalTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> </style>
<style name="SecondaryTextStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_secondary</item> </style>
<style name="InputStyle"> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/text_size_normal</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:textColorHint">@color/text_hint</item> <item name="android:padding">@dimen/padding_medium</item> </style> </resources>
